oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hernando Court House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The Court House -- Hernando – Miss." Black-and-white image.

"J.N. Manley, -- Gayoso Hotel, -- Memphis, -- Tenn. -- File -- Just a card to let -- you know we enjoyed -- being with you and -- knowing you on the -- Manley tour. -- Herbert McIngvale, -- Mrs. H.W. McIngvale, -- Virginia Crawford, -- Hernando, -- Miss."
